data.text:
@BTheorists (All deaths ARE tragic) 
But this is grasping at straws… kinda feels like the truck convoy, that had… well, one truck… 🤪
@Truth_in_Number @Lewislama @BTheorists EXACTLY.... but once again the cookers take data, especially headlines and make their own assumptions to fit their narrative.

@Lewislama @ye_aged @BTheorists 40% was from OneAmerica insurance's CEO.

Increase was 3rd quarter 2021 over 3rd quarter 2019, NOT over 2020. 

It matches CDC data. The CEO & CDC are clear: these were COVID realted deaths.

These were primarily unvaccinated deaths in the delta wave.
https://t.co/ZANjKxx4ym

@lesliehands95 @BTheorists Exactly right and like most things the risks were identified and mitigated. It is genuinely impressive what can be achieved when the will is there, the development of these vaccines should be celebrated.

@Lewislama @BTheorists and I agree with you on the excess deaths, but you're blaming vaccines, whereas science, mathematics, people who are smarter than you are blaming it to COVID - https://t.co/1wTGeh3b53

@Lewislama @BTheorists oh you have seriously drunk the Kool-Aid. You've failed but don't want to admit you are wrong. In the end it doesn't matter what you think. Science doesn't care. I bet you got all your childhood vaccinations

@ye_aged @BTheorists Maybe you should educate yourself on the TGA?

https://t.co/BOAHGhdNxQ

@clintwit1 @BTheorists Yeah cause so many antivaxxers called me an idiot when I said the jab wouldn’t kill you, because the situation with the blood clots was related to pre-existing medical conditions, not because the jab was designed to kill you.
